name: Magic Feedback Machine
description:
The Magic Feedback Machine is a web app I built that lets people write funny (or not so funny) emails, using the format of a company writing an email to a job applicant. 

It works by letting users “write” an email by clicking through a series of options. I wanted to explore how a simple mechanism and limited number of phrases could lead to a huge number of possible outcomes, ranging from extremely friendly messages to savage rejections.
